metadata.title: CVE-2019-3832 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
It was discovered the fix for CVE-2018-19758 (libsndfile) was not completeand still allows a read beyond the limits of a buffer in wav_write_header()function in wav.c. A local attacker may use this flaw to make theapplication crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3832` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-6
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-6').
